sense.def:
A flair for doing something
je naravna sposobnost za neko opravilo.

seg.quote: He had a flair for this branch of law.
Wilson was impressed by his political flair.

sense.def:
Flair
je tudi sposobnost, da delo opravimo izvirno, zanimivo in elegantno.

seg.quote: She showed her usual flair and cunning.
